core:processNote.core:description: Note we are not handling exceptions here because if a specified manifest is provided and it doesn't exist we consider this a fatal error
If the application ID is unrecognised, and we're not an internal update, there's no point reading any manifest
If a manifest is not found there's no point doing a version check. We might have sent an update to fix this missing manifest situation so we can't fail at this point either, so just continue.

core:param.value: Failed to load manifest file. Version check will be skipped.
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: Unrecognised application ID in update package. Version check will be skipped.
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: Failed to validate update version against application manifest
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage
